import "./App.css"; import search from './src/BooksAPI' import { useState,useEffect } from "react"; import Search from "./components/Search"; function App() { const [showSearchPage, setShowSearchpage] = useState(false); const [searchValue, setSearchValue] = useState(); const [posts, setPosts] = useState([]); useEffect( () => { if(searchValue !== undefined || posts.length !== 0 ){ console.log(posts) async function fetchData() { try { const res = await search(searchValue) setPosts(res); } catch (err) { console.log(err) } } fetchData(); }},[searchValue,posts] ); return (
{showSearchPage ? (
setShowSearchpage(!showSearchPage)} > Close
) : (

)}
); } export default App;
